item.title: Allocating project costs by unit for accounting purposes.
item.description:
While stuck in a Denver hotel room during a snowstorm, I finally had a chance to unravel a feature in our project management software. I’ve been curious about the Project Allocation feature since its release last summer but haven’t had a project that required it. My initial exploration didn’t help me grasp its capabilities compared to the Unit allocation method at the Cost Category level. However, last night’s testing session brought some clarity...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/allocating-project-costs-by-unit-for-accounting-purposes/
